id: German former nurse admits killing 100 patients
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Nadine Schmidt and Sheena McKenzie, CNN Updated 2:38 AM ET, Wed October 31, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Berlin (CNN)A German former nurse on Tuesday admitted murdering 100 patients, making him one of the country's deadliest post-war serial killers.Nadine Schmidt reported from Berlin, Sheena McKenzie wrote in London. Lindsay Isaac contributed to this report.
